OOC: I won't be able to post for NBW's till tommorrow, I have a few other
p=
laces to catch up on. However Sandy, do not forget, all radio
communication=
s are being blocked over the battle field for the Maximals and
Autobots.  A=
lso the tower would be too far away to be affected by the
noise. Although i=
t is possible they might hear it, but at that distance it
wouldn't be more =
than annoying to those on the outside, like a distant siren
or something, a=
nd just a dim noise if anything to those on the inside.

Anyways, Game on! =
:)

- Preston

<div>OOC: I won't be able to post for NBW's till tommorrow, I have =
a few other places to catch up on. However Sandy, do not forget, all radio =
communications are being blocked over the battle field for the Maximals and=
 Autobots.=A0 Also the tower would be too far away to be affected by the no=
ise.=A0Although it is possible they might hear it, but at that distance it =
wouldn't be more than annoying to those on the outside, like a distant =
siren or something,=A0and just a dim=A0noise if anything=A0to those on the =
inside. </div>

<div>=A0</div>
<div>Anyways, Game on! :)</div>
<div>=A0</di=
v>
<div>- Preston<br><br></div>

2011 at 11:08 AM, Sandy <span dir=3D"ltr"><<a href=3D"mailto:magicquartz=

 1ex" class=3D"gmail_quote">

<div>
<div>
<div>
<p>All bets were now off. This meant that who=
ever did not have their weapons could gladly take them up again. Yet, Tucso=
n was actually content just fighting unarmed, since his ninjabot training t=
aught him how to defend himself with only his hands, arms, feet and legs. N=
ight Shift too, was highly adept at this fighting style, yet Straight Shot =
was far more content by activating her own on board weaponry to step in for=
 an assist where she was needed. She quickly saw that Kup needed some help,=
 and quickly darts in, with a leap attack to attempt a rapid fire arrow ass=
ault on Phobia.<br>
<br>"No worries Kup, I gotchya! EAT THIS YA PLANE =
BRAIN WENCH!"<br><br>Meanwhile, Tucson's injured arm hinders him f=
ully from using the full benefit of his ninjabot training, yet tries hard t=
o compensate for the loss of that limb, by moving a bit faster on his feet,=
 positioning his good arm to defend himself. He also takes this quick momen=
t to think for a moment, as strategy was another one of his fortes. Then it=
 suddenly comes to him. His sonar system, it was still working at full capa=
city. But he would have to emit a signal more deafening than anything he ha=
d ever emitted before. And this time, there was no time to configure it so =
it would not hinder the Maximals or the Autobots. So, heavilly encrypted to=
 all Autobots and Maximals, he sends another message.<br>
<br>"Attenti=
on, all Maximals, and Autobots, the only solution I see to slowing our enem=
y down, is to emit a sonar signal that is ten times stronger than any of th=
e signals I've ever emitted before. I am capable of it, but have refrai=
ned due to a fear of harming you. There is no time for me to configure the =
signal, so I ask all of you now, to disable your audio receptors to keep th=
em from being harmed. I will emit this signal T minus thirty seconds. You h=
ave just that enough of time to cut off your receptors to keep them from ha=
rm. This is my first attempt at this tactic, and I am not sure as to the ou=
tcome. I ask all of you to bare with me, and to trust that this will slow t=
he attack long enough to gain an advantage."<br>
<br>Night Shift and S=
traight Shot quickly do as instructed. It was now up to Tucson to execute h=
is tactic.<br><br>Meanwhile, at the black fortress, Rat Trap also recieves =
Tucson's message, and nodds. He looks to Windlord, as he now faces the =
ugly little spider droids in the pipes.<br>
<br>" Aww geeze, I dunno i=
f thirty seconds is enough time ta save our tail ends... Now what? Spiders =
can go anywhere we can go.. I know... Follow my lead Windlord, I got an ide=
a."<br><br>Playing possum was one of the oldest tricks in the book, an=
d Rat Trap hoped it would get them both out of that bind. He starts to act =
as if having been poisoned by something, and collapses onto his side, breat=
ing ever so slowly, as if dying from intoxication. He hoped that Windlord w=
ould follow his lead, and hope that this would get those ugly little arachn=
ids off their backs.<br>
<br>At the Ark, Quickstride and Uproar listen to R=
odimus carefully. Although not the brightest bots on the force, they had en=
ough know how to hold their own in tough situations. <br><br>Uproar raises =
a paw.<br><br>"Hey, I think I have another idea ta help that one along=
 Rodimus. The shield around the ark, does that only work above ground or un=
derground too? Because if it doesn't work underground, I could burrow a=
 tunnel beneath the ark, and come above ground near an alternative entrance=
, if it has one. With your scrambling devices, and my ability ta dig under =
ground, we could get in without much of a fuss. Whoever's out there wou=
ldn't even know we're on the move." I know how ta dig without =
making noise."<br>
<br>Quickstride nodds.<br><br>"Hey, and while =
he does that, I could show myself, and create a distraction long enough for=
 you guys ta get in. We're not the most brilliant of the maximals, but =
we know the basics."
